column1: 1900 annual total was noted as estimated on the record sheet, therefore deleted
1901 annual total on the record sheet was in brackets but the total matches the sum of the monthly totals and none of the monthly totals are in brackets, therefore total left in the record

The rain gauge was noted as moving around the estate, e.g. 72 yards NW in 1901, and the positon may have changed at the beginning of 1901 when readings were resumed. GR is of the hall, the gauge is noted as being 25 ft. from a house.
Fitz Rectory site is 200 yards west of the manor and has records from 1902 to 1934
